lead_paragraph: The rampage opened a frightening new landscape of terrorism, using a weapon that is ubiquitous on roads in the United States and was encouraged by Al Qaeda years ago.

headline.print_headline: Rolling Mainstay of Commerce, Reinvented as a Tool of Death
headline.main: In Truck Attack in Nice, Mainstay of Commerce Reinvented as Tool of Death

snippet: The rampage opened a frightening new landscape of terrorism, using a weapon that is ubiquitous on roads in the United States and was encouraged by Al Qaeda years ago....
abstract: Terrorist attack in Nice, France, opens frightening new possibilities for terrorism in Western Europe and United States, where trucks like one used to mow down pedestrians are mainstay of commerce; attack points to Islamic State directive to kill anywhere and everywhere, rather than choosing high-profile means and targets.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
